Command.Name: InsertObject
Command.Description: Inserts the object with global object ID objId at position X,Y.

Parameter.Description: The global object ID of the game object to insert.
Parameter.Name: ID

Parameter.Description: The initial X position of the object when it is inserted.
Parameter.Name: X

Parameter.Description: The initial Y position of the object when it is inserted.
Parameter.Name: Y

Command.Name: DeleteObject
Command.Description: Deletes the object with global object ID id.

Parameter.Description: The global object ID of the object to delete.
Parameter.Name: ID
